definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Da 4:30 body (v. √ [[גשׁם]] in BH; Targum:J [[גּוּשְׁמָא]], [[גִּשְׁמָא]] (D:WB 83), Syr. guw4mo0, body, self);—body of man, sf. [[גִּשְׁמֵהּ]] Da 4:30, Da 5:21, so pl. sf. [[גַּשְׁמַיהוֹן]] (K:§ 15 a) Da 3:27, Da 3:28, both Kt, Qr sg. [[גֶּשְׁמֵהוֹן]] (K:§ 54, 3 b)).
